title: Ticket #2223: RFE: config parameter to limit number of matches per negotiation cycle
description:
The ability to put a specific limit on the number of jobs matched per negotiation cycle is useful for engineering some kind of testing scenarios, and may also be useful for field diagnoses.

A new config param, say NEGOTIATOR_MAX_MATCHES, defaulting to "no maximum", would do the job.
